title: Plant Pests and Diseases (Plant Quarantine and Phytosanitary Service Fees) Regulations, 2020
content:
14thAugust, 2020 Statutory Instruments 415
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
StatutoryInstrumentNo.70 of 2020
The Plant Pests and Diseases Act
(Laws,Volume14,Cap233)
The Plant Pests and Diseases (Plant Quarantine and
Phytosanitary Service Fees) Regulations, 2020
INEXERCISE ofthepowerscontainedinsections4,9and29of
the Plant Pests and DiseasesAct, the following Regulations are
made:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Plant Pests and Title
Diseases (Plant Quarantine and Phytosanitary Service Fees)
Regulations,2020.
2. In these Regulations, unless the context otherwise Interpretation
requires—
“commercial”inrelationtoplantsandplantproductsmeans
plantsorplantproductswhoseenduseistrade;
“ fresh produce ” means fresh fruits, vegetables and cut
flowersthatareexportedtoforeignmarkets;and
“ non-commercial ” means plants or plant products whose
enduseisfordomesticconsumption.
3. The feessetoutintheSchedulearepayable inrespect of Fees
themattersspecifiedtherein.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101Lusaka,PriceK8.00each
416 Statutory Instruments 14thAugust,2020
SCHEDULE
(Regulation2)
PRESCRIBEDFEES
A. PHYTOSANITARYDOCUMENT
FeeUnits
1. PhytosanitaryCertificate(commercial) 400
2. Phytosanitary Certificate (fresh produce) 200
3. PhytosanitaryCertificate(noncommercial) 200
4. PlantImportPermit(commercial) 433
5. PlantImportPermit(non-commercial) 216,67
6. PlantMovementPermit-
- forconsignmentweighingupto10metrictonnes 66.67
- forconsignmentexceeding10metrictonnes 166.67
7. Transit Permit 1,000
B. MISCELLANEOUSPHYTOSANITARYSERVICES
1. Premisesinspection 650
2. Exportinspection 650
3. Import inspection 650
4. Fumigationinspection 650
5. Fumigationequipmentinspection 650
6. Nursery inspection 650
7. Treatment facility inspection 650
8. Farminspection 650
9. PestRiskAnalysis(commercial) 1666,67
10. PestRiskAnalysis(non-commercial) 833,33
Notes:
(a) An inspection fee per kilometre for a distance of 5 km or more
fromaphytosanitaryofficesis653.33 feeunits.
(b) An inspection fee for export, import and fumigation ofplants up
to30metrictonsis650feeunits,andanadditionalfeeof—
(i) 0.015feeunitsforeachadditionaltonupto1000metric
tons; or
(ii) 0.0075feeunitsforeachadditionaltonabove1000.
(c) Afarminspectionandfarmaudituptoahectareexcludingthecost
oftransportis1,000feeunits.
(d) Afarminspectionforeachadditionalhectaretoaninspectionunder
paragraph(c),excludingchargeoftransport,is166feeunits.
(e) Thecostoftransportisbasedonthefollowinggovernmentformula
fora4*4vehicle:
(FuelPricexDistancex1.1x2)
5
14thAugust, 2020 Statutory Instruments 417
C. PHYTOSANITARYLICENCES
1. Fumigationlicence-firstregistration 10,000.00
2. Fumigationlicencerenewal 6,666.67
3. Treatmentfacilitylicence 10,000.00
4. Tobaccopremiseslicence 10,000.00
5. Otherpremiseslicence 5,000.00
6. Plantnurseryregistration(formalgarden) 1,000.00
7. Plantnurseryregistration(informalgarden) 666.67
D.LABORATORYTESTS
1. Bacteria 833.33
2. Fungi 833.33
3. Nematodes 283.33
4. Insects 283.33
5. Viruses 1,000.00
6. AdvancedLaboratoryTests(PCR)persample 1,666.67
7. Cultureexaminationpersample 550.00
M.KATAMBO,
LUSAKA Minister of Agriculture
7thAugust,2020
[MOA/64/9/4]
